attributes.action: Award an OBE or MBE to every surviving British world war 2 veteran.
attributes.background: In thanks to their bravery and service every surviving British world war 2 veteran to be awarded an OBE or an MBE

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
